name: dinelink-hk
description: DineLink - Hong Kong Group Dining Coordinator with Cultural Intelligence

scripts.dev: npm run ensure:env && npm run ensure:venv && concurrently --raw "npm run dev:api" --prefix "[WEB] " "npm run dev:web"
scripts.build: npm run build:web && cp -r apps/web/.next .next && cp -r apps/web/public public
scripts.build:web: cd apps/web && npm install && npm run build
